1H1a1r1d1-1L1i1n1e1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1R1e1f1o1r1m1e1r1s1 1T1a2p1e1d1 1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1s1‚1Ä1ô1 1I1r1e1.1 1N1o1w1,1 1B1o1t1h1 1A1r1e1 1P1r1o1t1e1s1t1 1T1a1r1g1e1t1s1.
1L2e1r1 1e1n1 1e1s1p1a1√1±1o1l
1B1y1 1T1H1O1M1A1S1 1E1R1D1B1R1I1N1K1J1A1N1.1 121,1 12101118

1C1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1i1n1 1s1t1o1r1y1S1h1a1r1e1 1T1h1i1s1 1P1a1g1e

1P1h1o1t1o

1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1s1u1p1r1e1m1e1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1,1 1A1y1a1t1o2l1a1h1 1A1l1i1 1K1h1a1m1e1n1e1i1,1 1b1l1a1m1e1d1 1‚1Ä1ú1e1n1e1m1i1e1s1‚1Ä1ù1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1a1n1t1i1g1o1v1e1r1n1m1e1n1t1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1b1u1t1 1d1i1d1 1n1o1t1 1s1p1e1c1i1f1y1 1w1h1o1.1 1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1A2t1a1 1K1e1n1a1r1e1/1A1g1e1n1c1e1 1F1r1a1n1c1e1-1P1r1e2s1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1G1e2t1y1 1I1m1a1g1e1s
1T1E1H1R1A1N1 1‚1Ä1î1 1A1n1t1i1g1o1v1e1r1n1m1e1n1t1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1r1o1i1l1e1d1 1I1r1a1n1 1o1n1 1T1u1e1s1d1a1y1,1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1d1e1a1t1h1 1t1o2l1 1r1o1s1e1 1t1o1 12111 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1n1a1t1i1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1s1u1p1r1e1m1e1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1 1b1l1a1m1e1d1 1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1 1e1n1e1m1i1e1s1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1u1n1r1e1s1t1.1 1B1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1s1p1r1e1a1d1 1t1o1 1d1o1z1e1n1s1 1o1f1 1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1s1t1 1s1i1x1 1d1a1y1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1s1e1t1 1o2f1 1b1y1 1m1i1s1c1a1l1c1u1l1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1i1n1 1a1 1l1o1n1g1-1s1i2m1e1r1i1n1g1 1p1o1w1e1r1 1s1t1r1u2g1l1e1 1b1e1t1w2e1n1 1h1a1r1d1-1l1i1n1e1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1r1e1f1o1r1m1e1r1s1.

1B1y1 1T1u1e1s1d1a1y1,1 1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1n1o1 1l1o1n1g1e1r1 1i1g1n1o1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1a1n1d1 1f1e1l1t1 1c1o1m1p1e2l1e1d1 1t1o1 1r1e1s1p1o1n1d1 1p1u1b1l1i1c1l1y1.1 1A1y1a1t1o2l1a1h1 1A1l1i1 1K1h1a1m1e1n1e1i1,1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1p1r1e1m1e1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1,1 1b1l1a1m1e1d1 1o1u1t1s1i1d1e1 1‚1Ä1ú1e1n1e1m1i1e1s1‚1Ä1ù1 1b1u1t1 1d1i1d1 1n1o1t1 1s1p1e1c1i1f1y1 1w1h1o1.1 1P1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1 1H1a2s1a1n1 1R1o1u1h1a1n1i1,1 1a1 1m1o1d1e1r1a1t1e1,1 1a2p1e1a1l1e1d1 1f1o1r1 1c1a1l1m1 1w1h1i1l1e1 1s1a1y1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1e1r1s1 1h1a1d1 1a1 1r1i1g1h1t1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1h1e1a1r1d1.

1B1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1a1n1g1e1r1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1w1a1s1 1d1i1r1e1c1t1e1d1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1t1h1e1 1e1n1t1i1r1e1 1p1o1l1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1e1s1t1a1b1l1i1s1h1m1e1n1t1.

1W1h1i1l1e1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1w1e1p1t1 1I1r1a1n1 1i1n1 1220191 1w1e1r1e1 1l1e1d1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1m1i2d1l1e1 1c1l1a2s1,1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1b2e1n1 1l1a1r1g1e1l1y1 1d1r1i1v1e1n1 1b1y1 1d1i1s1a2f1e1c1t1e1d1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1i1n1 1r1u1r1a1l1 1a1r1e1a1s1,1 1t1o1w1n1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1m1a2l1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1 1w1h1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1s1e1i1z1e1d1 1a1n1 1o1p1e1n1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1v1e1n1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1f1r1u1s1t1r1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1w1i1t1h1 1a1 1p1o1l1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1e1l1i1t1e1 1t1h1e1y1 1s1a1y1 1h1a1s1 1h1i1j1a1c1k1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1y1 1t1o1 1s1e1r1v1e1 1i1t1s1 1o1w1n1 1i1n1t1e1r1e1s1t1s1.

1U1n1e1m1p1l1o1y1m1e1n1t1 1f1o1r1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1h1a1l1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1t1i1o1n1 1‚1Ä1î1 1r1u1n1s1 1a1t1 14101 1p1e1r1c1e1n1t1,1 1a1n1a1l1y1s1t1s1 1b1e1l1i1e1v1e1.1 1M1e1a1n1w1h1i1l1e1,1 1I1r1a1n1 1h1a1s1 1s1p1e1n1t1 1b1i2l1i1o1n1s1 1o1f1 1d1o2l1a1r1s1 1a1b1r1o1a1d1 1i1n1 1r1e1c1e1n1t1 1y1e1a1r1s1 1t1o1 1e1x1t1e1n1d1 1i1t1s1 1i1n1f1l1u1e1n1c1e1 1i1n1 1I1r1a1q1,1 1S1y1r1i1a1 1a1n1d1 1L1e1b1a1n1o1n1.

1T1h1e1 1i1n1i1t1i1a1l1 1c1a1t1a1l1y1s1t1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1a1n1g1e1r1 1a2p1e1a1r1s1 1t1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1b2e1n1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1a1k1 1b1y1 1P1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1 1R1o1u1h1a1n1i1 1l1a1s1t1 1m1o1n1t1h1 1o1f1 1a1 1p1r1o1p1o1s1e1d1 1g1o1v1e1r1n1m1e1n1t1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1.1 1F1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1t1i1m1e1,1 1s1e1c1r1e1t1 1p1a1r1t1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1,1 1i1n1c1l1u1d1i1n1g1 1d1e1t1a1i1l1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1r1e1l1i1g1i1o1u1s1 1i1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1e1s1,1 1w1e1r1e1 1e1x1p1o1s1e1d1.

1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1s1 1d1i1s1c1o1v1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1b1i2l1i1o1n1s1 1o1f1 1d1o2l1a1r1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1g1o1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1h1a1r1d1-1l1i1n1e1 1o1r1g1a1n1i1z1a1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1t1h1e1 1m1i1l1i1t1a1r1y1,1 1t1h1e1 1I1s1l1a1m1i1c1 1R1e1v1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1a1r1y1 1G1u1a1r1d1s1 1C1o1r1p1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1r1e1l1i1g1i1o1u1s1 1f1o1u1n1d1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1e1n1r1i1c1h1 1t1h1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1a1l1 1e1l1i1t1e1.1 1A1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1t1i1m1e1,1 1t1h1e1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1 1p1r1o1p1o1s1e1d1 1t1o1 1e1n1d1 1c1a1s1h1 1s1u1b1s1i1d1i1e1s1 1f1o1r1 1m1i2l1i1o1n1s1 1o1f1 1c1i1t1i1z1e1n1s1,1 1i1n1c1r1e1a1s1e1 1f1u1e1l1 1p1r1i1c1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1i1v1a1t1i1z1e1 1p1u1b1l1i1c1 1s1c1h2o1l1s1.

1T1h1e1 1l1e1a1k1 1a2p1e1a1r1e1d1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1i1n1t1e1n1d1e1d1 1t1o1 1t1a1p1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1r1 1r1e1s1e1n1t1m1e1n1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1i1t1 1w1o1r1k1e1d1.1 1T1e1l1e1g1r1a1m1,1 1a1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1m1e1d1i1a1 1m1e2s1a1g1i1n1g1 1a2p1 1u1s1e1d1 1b1y1 1o1v1e1r1 14101 1m1i2l1i1o1n1 1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1s1,1 1b1l1e1w1 1u1p1 1w1i1t1h1 1a1n1g1r1y1 1c1o2m1e1n1t1s1.

1‚1Ä1ú1I1t1 1m1a1d1e1 1m1e1 1a1n1g1r1y1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1s1a1i1d1 1M1e1h1d1i1,1 231,1 1f1r1o1m1 1I1z1e1h1,1 1a1 1t1o1w1n1 1i1n1 1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1p2o1r1 1K1h1u1z1e1s1t1a1n1 1P1r1o1v1i1n1c1e1,1 1w1h1o1 1a1s1k1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1h1i1s1 1f1a1m1i1l1y1 1n1a1m1e1 1n1o1t1 1b1e1 1u1s1e1d1 1o1u1t1 1o1f1 1f1e1a1r1 1o1f1 1r1e1t1a1l1i1a1t1i1o1n1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1T1h1e1r1e1 1w1e1r1e1 1a2l1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1r1e1l1i1g1i1o1u1s1 1o1r1g1a1n1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1r1e1c1e1i1v1e1d1 1h1i1g1h1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1s1,1 1w1h1i1l1e1 1w1e1 1s1t1r1u2g1l1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1c1o1n1s1t1a1n1t1 1u1n1e1m1p1l1o1y1m1e1n1t1.1‚1Ä1ù

1L1a1s1t1 1T1h1u1r1s1d1a1y1,1 1h1a1r1d1-1l1i1n1e1r1s1 1t1r1i1e1d1 1t1o1 1t1a1k1e1 1b1a1c1k1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1i1t1i1a1t1i1v1e1 1a1n1d1 1e1m1b1a2r1a2s1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1,1 1s1t1a1g1i1n1g1 1a1 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1h1o1l1y1 1c1i1t1y1 1M1a1s2h1a1d1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1h1u1n1d1r1e1d1s1 1c1h1a1n1t1e1d1 1s1l1o1g1a1n1s1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1t1h1e1 1w1e1a1k1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1y1 1a1n1d1 1s1h1o1u1t1e1d1 1‚1Ä1ú1d1e1a1t1h1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1d1i1c1t1a1t1o1r1‚1Ä1ù1 1a1n1d1 1‚1Ä1ú1d1e1a1t1h1 1t1o1 1R1o1u1h1a1n1i1.1‚1Ä1ù

1V1i1d1e1o
1W1h1a1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1B1e1h1i1n1d1 1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1P1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1?
1W1i1d1e1s1p1r1e1a1d1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1c1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1 1i1n1 1I1r1a1n1.1 1I1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1r1g1e1s1t1 1u1n1r1e1s1t1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1t1h1e1 1220191 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1M1a1h1m1o1u1d1 1A1h1m1a1d1i1n1e1j1a1d1,1 1t1h1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1.1 1B1u1t1 1t1h1i1s1 1t1i1m1e1 1i1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1d1i2f1e1r1e1n1t1.1 1H1e1r1e1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1w1h1y1.1 1B1y1 1N1I1L1O1 1T1A1B1R1I1Z1Y1 1a1n1d1 1C1H1R1I1S1 1C1I1R1I2L1O1 1o1n1 1P1u1b1l1i1s1h1 1D1a1t1e1 1J1a1n1u1a1r1y1 121,1 121011181.1 1P1h1o1t1o1 1b1y1 1A1g1e1n1c1e1 1F1r1a1n1c1e1-1P1r1e2s1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1G1e2t1y1 1I1m1a1g1e1s1.1 1W1a1t1c1h1 1i1n1 1T1i1m1e1s1 1V1i1d1e1o1 1¬1ª
1 1E1m1b1e1d
1A1n1 1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1 1s1e1c1u1r1i1t1y1 1o2f1i1c1i1a1l1 1c1o1n1f1i1r1m1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1F1r1i1d1a1y1 1p1r1a1y1e1r1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1i1t1y1,1 1A1h1m1a1d1 1A1l1a1m1o1l1h1o1d1a1,1 1a1 1p1r1o1m1i1n1e1n1t1 1h1a1r1d1-1l1i1n1e1r1,1 1h1a1d1 1b2e1n1 1s1u2m1o1n1e1d1 1b1y1 1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1N1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1S1e1c1u1r1i1t1y1 1C1o1u1n1c1i1l1 1t1o1 1e1x1p1l1a1i1n1 1h1i1s1 1r1o1l1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1i1o1n1.

1V1i1d1e1o1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1g1a1t1h1e1r1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1n1 1w1e1n1t1 1v1i1r1a1l1 1o1n1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1m1e1d1i1a1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1h1a1d1 1f1o1r1 1w2e1k1s1 1b2e1n1 1h1e1a1t1e1d1l1y1 1d1i1s1c1u2s1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1p1o1s1e1d1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1.1 1F1r1u1s1t1r1a1t1e1d1 1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1s1 1e1l1s1e1w1h1e1r1e1 1w1e1r1e1 1e1m1b1o1l1d1e1n1e1d1.

1I1n1 1r1e1a1c1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1 1i1n1 1M1a1s2h1a1d1,1 1H1e1s1a1m1o1d1i1n1 1A1s1h1n1a1,1 1a1 1t1r1u1s1t1e1d1 1a1d1v1i1s1e1r1 1t1o1 1P1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1 1R1o1u1h1a1n1i1,1 1s1e1n1t1 1o1u1t1 1a1 1T1w1i2t1e1r1 1m1e2s1a1g1e1 1o1n1 1F1r1i1d1a1y1,1 1h1i1g1h1l1i1g1h1t1i1n1g1 1‚1Ä1ú1t1h1e1 1u1n1b1a1l1a1n1c1e1d1 1d1i1s1t1r1i1b1u1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1.1‚1Ä1ù

1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1m1i1l1i1t1a1r1y1 1f1o1r1c1e1s1,1 1a1c1t1i1v1e1 1i1n1 1s1e1v1e1r1a1l1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1i1e1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1M1i2d1l1e1 1E1a1s1t1,1 1s1a1w1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1 1i1n1c1r1e1a1s1e1 1t1o1 1$211 1b1i2l1i1o1n1,1 1a1 1n1e1a1r1l1y1 12101 1p1e1r1c1e1n1t1 1r1i1s1e1,1 1h1e1 1s1a1i1d1.1 1T1h1e1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1 1f1o1r1 1r1e1p1r1e1s1e1n1t1a1t1i1v1e1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1p1r1e1m1e1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1 1i1n1 1u1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1i1e1s1 1w1a1s1 1i1n1c1r1e1a1s1e1d1.1 1A1n1 1i1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1e1 1r1u1n1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1h1a1r1d1-1l1i1n1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1 1M1o1h1a2m1a1d1 1T1a1g1h1i1 1M1e1s1h1b1a1h1-1Y1a1z1d1i1 1w1a1s1 1t1o1 1r1e1c1e1i1v1e1 1e1i1g1h1t1 1t1i1m1e1s1 1a1s1 1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1a1 1d1e1c1a1d1e1 1a1g1o1.

1O1n1l1i1n1e1 1a1n1g1e1r1 1r1e1a1c1h1e1d1 1a1 1b1o1i1l1i1n1g1 1p1o1i1n1t1.

1F1o1r1 1d1e1c1a1d1e1s1,1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1l1i1v1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1p1r1o1v1i1n1c1i1a1l1 1t1o1w1n1s1 1a1n1d1 1v1i2l1a1g1e1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1r1e1g1a1r1d1e1d1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1b1a1c1k1b1o1n1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1I1s1l1a1m1i1c1 1r1e1g1i1m1e1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1t1e1n1d1e1d1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1c1o1n1s1e1r1v1a1t1i1v1e1,1 1a1v1e1r1s1e1 1t1o1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1 1a1n1d1 1p1i1o1u1s1 1f1o2l1o1w1e1r1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1b1e1r1 1I1s1l1a1m1i1c1 1l1i1f1e1s1t1y1l1e1 1p1r1o1m1o1t1e1d1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1a1t1e1.

1I1n1 1l1e2s1 1t1h1a1n1 1a1 1d1e1c1a1d1e1,1 1a2l1 1t1h1a1t1 1h1a1s1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1d1.1 1A1 11141-1y1e1a1r1 1d1r1o1u1g1h1t1 1h1a1s1 1e1m1p1t1i1e1d1 1v1i2l1a1g1e1s1,1 1w1i1t1h1 1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1s1 1m1o1v1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1n1e1a1r1b1y1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1t1h1e1y1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1s1t1r1u2g1l1e1 1t1o1 1f1i1n1d1 1j1o1b1s1.1 1A2c1e2s1 1t1o1 1s1a1t1e2l1i1t1e1 1t1e1l1e1v1i1s1i1o1n1 1a1n1d1,1 1m1o1r1e1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1,1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1b1i1l1e1 1i1n1t1e1r1n1e1t1 1h1a1s1 1w1i1d1e1n1e1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1w1o1r1l1d1.

1‚1Ä1ú1O1n1 1I1n1s1t1a1g1r1a1m1,1 1I1 1s1a1w1 1a1 1p1i1c1t1u1r1e1 1o1f1 1a1 1w1o1m1a1n1 1i1n1 1T1e1h1r1a1n1 1w1i1t1h1 1h1e1r1 1S1.1U1.1V1.1,1 1w1h1o1 1w1r1o1t1e1 1s1h1e1 1s1p1e1n1d1s1 1$131,301 1o1n1 1h1e1r1 1p1e1t1s1 1e1a1c1h1 1m1o1n1t1h1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1M1e1h1d1i1 1s1a1i1d1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1A1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1 1c1a1n1 1l1i1v1e1 1h1e1r1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1o1n1e1y1 1f1o1r1 1a1 1y1e1a1r1.1 1I1 1g1o1t1 1a1n1g1r1y1.1‚1Ä1ù

1H1i1s1 1c1i1t1y1,1 1I1z1e1h1,1 1w1a1s1 1f1a1m1o1u1s1 1f1o1r1 1b1e1i1n1g1 1h1o1m1e1 1t1o1 1m1a1n1y1 1w1h1o1 1h1a1d1 1b2e1n1 1e1x1i1l1e1d1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1h1a1r1d1-1l1i1n1e1 1j1u1d1i1c1i1a1r1y1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1I1z1e1h1 1h1a1s1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1d1 1a1 1l1o1t1 1o1v1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1y1e1a1r1s1 1‚1Ä1î1 1m1o1r1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1n1o1 1e1n1t1e1r1t1a1i1n1m1e1n1t1,1 1n1o1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1a1 1c1i1n1e1m1a1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1h1e1 1s1a1i1d1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1M1a1n1y1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1u1s1e1 1d1r1u1g1s1.1‚1Ä1ù

1O1n1 1F1r1i1d1a1y1,1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1b1r1o1k1e1 1o1u1t1 1i1n1 1I1z1e1h1.1 1T1h1e1 1g1o1v1e1r1n1m1e1n1t1 1n1e1w1s1 1a1g1e1n1c1y1 1s1a1i1d1 1t1w1o1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1e1r1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1k1i2l1e1d1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1b1y1 1s1e1c1u1r1i1t1y1 1f1o1r1c1e1s1.

1I1n1 1T1e1h1r1a1n1,1 1t1h1e1 1c1a1p1i1t1a1l1,1 1M1o1h1a2m1a1d1 1A1l1i1n1e1j1a1d1 1h1a1d1 1b2e1n1 1s1i2t1i1n1g1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1w1h2e1l1 1o1f1 1h1i1s1 1d1i1l1a1p1i1d1a1t1e1d1 1P1e1u1g1e1o1t1 1w1h1e1n1 1h1e1 1h1e1a1r1d1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1i1n1 1M1a1s2h1a1d1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1I1 1w1a1s1 1c1h2e1r1i1n1g1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1h1e1 1s1a1i1d1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1I1 1w1a1n1t1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1s1 1t1o1 1g1o1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1d1e1s1t1r1o1y1e1d1 1m1y1 1l1i1f1e1.1‚1Ä1ù

1P1h1o1t1o

1A1 1m1a1r1k1e1t1 1i1n1 1T1e1h1r1a1n1 1o1n1 1T1u1e1s1d1a1y1.1 1T1h1e1 1n1a1t1i1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1u1n1e1m1p1l1o1y1m1e1n1t1 1r1a1t1e1 1f1o1r1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1h1a1l1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1t1i1o1n1 1‚1Ä1î1 1r1u1n1s1 1a1t1 14101 1p1e1r1c1e1n1t1.1 1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1A2t1a1 1K1e1n1a1r1e1/1A1g1e1n1c1e1 1F1r1a1n1c1e1-1P1r1e2s1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1G1e2t1y1 1I1m1a1g1e1s
1H1e1 1h1a1d1 1b2e1n1 1h1i1t1 1b1y1 1s1h1r1a1p1n1e1l1 1d1u1r1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1e1i1g1h1t1-1y1e1a1r1 1I1r1a1n1-1I1r1a1q1 1w1a1r1,1 1a1n1d1 1a1 1p1i1e1c1e1 1h1a1d1 1r1e1m1a1i1n1e1d1 1s1t1u1c1k1 1i1n1 1h1i1s1 1h1e1a1d1.1 1H1i1s1 1s1t1a1t1u1s1 1a1s1 1a1 1h1a1n1d1i1c1a2p1e1d1 1v1e1t1e1r1a1n1 1e1x1e1m1p1t1s1 1h1i1s1 1s1o1n1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1n1d1a1t1o1r1y1 12141-1m1o1n1t1h1 1m1i1l1i1t1a1r1y1 1s1e1r1v1i1c1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1w1h1e1n1 1h1e1 1t1r1i1e1d1 1t1o1 1g1e1t1 1t1h1e1 1e1x1e1m1p1t1i1o1n1 1p1a1p1e1r1s1 1h1e1 1g1o1t1 1s1t1u1c1k1 1i1n1 1a1 1b1u1r1e1a1u1c1r1a1t1i1c1 1m1e2r1y1-1g1o1-1r1o1u1n1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1i1s1 1a2l1 1t2o1 1c1o2m1o1n1 1f1o1r1 1I1r1a1n1i1a1n1s1.

1‚1Ä1ú1I1 1h1a1d1 1t1o1 1p1a1y1 1b1r1i1b1e1s1,1 1o1r1 1e1l1s1e1 1n1o1 1o1n1e1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1h1e1l1p1 1m1e1,1 1a1n1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1e1n1d1 1w1e1 1d1i1d1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1g1e1t1 1a1n1y1w1h1e1r1e1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1h1e1 1s1a1i1d1.

1H1e1 1b1l1a1m1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1s1 1f1o1r1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1:1 1p1r1i1v1a1t1i1z1a1t1i1o1n1,1 1c1o2r1u1p1t1i1o1n1,1 1i1n1e1q1u1a1l1i1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1l1o1n1g1 1d1a1y1s1 1w1i1t1h1 1l1o1w1 1p1a1y1.

1‚1Ä1ú1I1 1d1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1c1a1r1e1 1i1f1 1o1u1r1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1 1b1e1c1o1m1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1n1e1x1t1 1I1r1a1q1 1o1r1 1S1y1r1i1a1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1h1e1 1s1a1i1d1,1 1‚1Ä1ú1b1u1t1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1m1 1s1o1 1f1r1u1s1t1r1a1t1e1d1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1m1,1 1t1h1a1t1 1I1 1j1u1s1t1 1w1a1n1t1 1t1h1e1m1 1g1o1n1e1 1a1n1d1 1w1e1 1c1a1n1 1t1h1i1n1k1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1n1s1e1q1u1e1n1c1e1s1 1t1o1m1o2r1o1w1.1‚1Ä1ù

1I1n1 1Q1o1m1,1 1t1h1e1 1c1e1n1t1e1r1 1o1f1 1I1r1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1t1h1e1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1 1e1d1u1c1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1i1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1e1s1,1 1o1n1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1 1s1a1i1d1 1h1e1 1w1a1s1 1w1o2r1i1e1d1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1v1e1l1 1o1f1 1a1n1g1e1r1.

1‚1Ä1ú1P1e1o1p1l1e1 1a1r1e1 1a1n1g1r1y1 1w1h1e1n1 1t1h1e1y1 1s2e1 1h1o1w1 1m1u1c1h1 1m1o1n1e1y1 1s1o1m1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1a1l1 1i1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1i1o1n1s1 1a1n1d1 1F1r1i1d1a1y1 1p1r1a1y1e1r1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1s1 1a1r1e1 1b1e1i1n1g1 1p1a1i1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1t1h1e1 1c1l1e1r1i1c1,1 1F1a1z1e1l1 1M1e1y1b1o1d1i1,1 1s1a1i1d1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1M1a1n1y1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1m1 1a1r1e1 1o1l1d1 1a1n1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1n1o1 1a2p1e1a1l1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1t1h1s1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1m1u1s1t1 1b1e1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1d1.1‚1Ä1ù

1A1s1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1 1t2o1k1 1o2f1 1i1n1 1a1b1o1u1t1 14101 1c1i1t1i1e1s1 1a1c1r1o2s1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1,1 1T1e1h1r1a1n1 1r1e1m1a1i1n1e1d1 1l1a1r1g1e1l1y1 1q1u1i1e1t1.1 1I1n1 1220191,1 1o1v1e1r1 1t1h1r2e1 1m1i2l1i1o1n1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1t2o1k1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1r2e1t1s1 1d1i1s1p1u1t1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1e1l1e1c1t1i1o1n1s1.

1B1u1t1 1t1h1i1s1 1t1i1m1e1,1 1m1a1n1y1 1s1a1i1d1 1t1h1e1y1 1f1e1a1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1r1a1g1i1n1g1,1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1l1e2s1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1s1.

1‚1Ä1ú1T1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1a1n1g1r1y1,1 1a1n1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1a1 1r1i1g1h1t1 1t1o1 1b1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1i1s1 1j1u1s1t1 1n1o1t1h1i1n1g1 1m1o1r1e1,1 1n1o1 1p1l1a1n1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1d1a1y1 1a1f1t1e1r1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1s1a1i1d1 1H1a1m1i1d1r1e1z1a1 1F1a1r1a1j1i1,1 1a1 1c1o1s1m1e1t1i1c1 1a1n1d1 1h1o1n1e1y1 1s1a1l1e1s1m1a1n1 1w1h1o1 1s1t1r1u2g1l1e1s1 1t1o1 1l1i1v1e1 1a1 1d1e1c1e1n1t1 1l1i1f1e1.


1W1R1I1T1E1 1A1 1C1O2M1E1N1T
1‚1Ä1ú1W1e1 1c1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1k2e1p1 1o1n1 1g1o1i1n1g1 1o1n1 1t1o1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1 1o1u1r1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1s1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1h1e1 1s1a1i1d1,1 1s1t1a1n1d1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1h1i1s1 1s1h1o1p1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1l1i1k1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1 1n1e1a1r1b1y1 1w1a1s1 1e1m1p1t1y1 1o1f1 1c1u1s1t1o1m1e1r1s1.1 1N1o1 1o1n1e1 1h1e1 1k1n1e1w1 1w1a1n1t1e1d1 1I1r1a1n1 1t1o1 1b1e1c1o1m1e1 1t1h1e1 1n1e1x1t1 1S1y1r1i1a1 1o1r1 1I1r1a1q1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1c1h1a1o1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1f1o2l1o1w1,1 1h1e1 1e1x1p1l1a1i1n1e1d1.

1‚1Ä1ú1M1a1n1y1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1t1e1s1t1e1r1s1 1s1h1o1u1t1,1 1‚1Ä1ú1N1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1G1a1z1a1 1n1o1r1 1L1e1b1a1n1o1n1,1 1I1 1w1i2l1 1g1i1v1e1 1m1y1 1l1i1f1e1 1f1o1r1 1I1r1a1n1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1M1r1.1 1F1a1r1a1j1i1 1s1a1i1d1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1B1u1t1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1n1t1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1i1s1 1b1a1d1 1g1a1m1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1g1i1o1n1,1 1s1o1 1n1o1w1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1o1 1f1i1n1i1s1h1 1i1t1.1 1J1u1s1t1 1l1i1k1e1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1n1o1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1 1b1u1t1 1t1o1 1l1i1v1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1o1u1r1 1l1e1a1d1e1r1s1.1 1U1n1l1e2s1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1i1s1 1a1 1b1e2t1e1r1 1a1l1t1e1r1n1a1t1i1v1e1.1‚1Ä1ù
